page.title: 11LOCAL EMPLOYMENT 3
page.content: {Holsworthy Electronics began in 1967 producing a miniature type of precision metal film resistor not available from other sources at that time. The company employ 250 people from the surrounding area.It came to this area because it would receive a Government Development Grant. The modern factory is sited on the Holsworthy Industrial Estate with a total area of 1400 sq.metres. It's wide range of precision metal film resistors forms the bulk of production .Four case sizes are available,the smallest being 6.22mm * 2.41mm dia.These have been developed from the technology used in the design and production of the custom built thick film and hybrid circuits.These products are exported to:Switzerland ,W.Germany,S.Africa, Spain,India, Holland and Denmark.
